=======
History
=======

0.0.5 (2020-01-17)
------------------

- Use generic marathon constraints settings.


0.0.4 (2019-12-19)
------------------

- Added support for host and ip lookups.


0.0.3 (2019-12-19)
------------------

- Catch also `ImportErrors` for simple settings.


0.0.2 (2019-12-19)
------------------

- Rename env var only_initialize to scheduler_action.


0.0.1 (2019-12-19)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
